course_description:
The mission of the MIT-Haiti Initiative is to promote active learning in Kreyòl so that Haitians can have universal access to quality education in the language that most of them speak at home. The Initiative’s [website](http://haiti.mit.edu/) includes software tools for math, physics, genetics and biochemistry education, as well as a glossary of Kreyòl equivalents for English words commonly used in the STEM disciplines. 

The related [Platfòm MIT-Ayiti](http://mit-ayiti.net/) offers a wealth of other freely accessible educational resources in Kreyòl, including downloadable lesson plans and picture books categorized by topic.
